subject: refactor(layout): move Activity below Skills and rename chart titles
body:
Move ActivityCharts section from above Projects to below Skills so the
page flows: About → Projects → Skills → Activity → CTA. Rename chart
titles from "Days I work" / "Hours I work" to "Most Active Days" /
"Peak Working Hours" for clarity.

Tags: layout, charts, ux
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: cv-layout
Semver: patch
